review: CREATE TABLE `review` (`review_id` SMALLINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL  DEFAULT 0, `rating_amount` SMALLINT NOT NULL  DEFAULT 0, `rating_score` INT NOT NULL  DEFAULT 0, `rating_average`FLOAT  DEFAULT 0, PRIMARY KEY (`review_id`));
child: CREATE TABLE `child` (`id` SMALLINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, `type` VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL,  `city` VARCHAR(5) NOT NULL, `district` VARCHAR(5) NOT NULL, `address` VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL, `longitude` FLOAT NOT NULL, `latitude` FLOAT NOT NULL, `accommodate` INT NOT NULL,  `rating_amount` SMALLINT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,`rating_score` INT NOT NULL  DEFAULT 0, `rating_average`FLOAT  DEFAULT 0, PRIMARY KEY (`id`))
parent: CREATE TABLE `parent` (`id` SMALLINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, `type` VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL,  `city` VARCHAR(5) NOT NULL, `district` VARCHAR(5) NOT NULL, `address` VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL, `longitude` FLOAT NOT NULL, `latitude` FLOAT NOT NULL, `rating_amount` SMALLINT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,`rating_score` INT NOT NULL  DEFAULT 0, `rating_average`FLOAT  DEFAULT 0, PRIMARY KEY (`id`))
child_message: CREATE TABLE `child_message` (`id` SMALLINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,  `date` DATE NOT NULL, `message` VARCHAR(300) DEFAULT '', `rating` SMALLINT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`));
elderly_message: CREATE TABLE `elderly_message` (`id` SMALLINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,  `date` DATE NOT NULL, `message` VARCHAR(300) DEFAULT '', `rating` SMALLINT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`));
